name: Skeleton
description: Loading placeholder that mimics content layout with configurable shapes and animations

accessibility.screenReader: Uses role=status with aria-busy=true to announce loading state. Provides accessible label (default 'Loading...'). Screen readers announce the loading status without repeated announcements.

recommendedUsage: Use while content is loading to indicate layout structure. Match skeleton shapes to expected content (text, circular for avatars, rectangular for images). Disable animation for reduced motion preference.
antiPatterns: Do not use for indeterminate loading of unknown content - use Spinner instead. Avoid using skeletons for very brief loading states. Do not animate skeletons if user prefers reduced motion.
